content: 12 *ssk k6 k2tog* twice <16 sts> lizard 13 *ssk k4 k2tog* twice <12 sts> at the end of row 13 stuff head with stuffing and continue working this extremely easy knit is a quick project with great end results please note that the 14 knit end product or pattern may not be sold 15 *kfb k4 kfb* twice <16 sts> without explicit permission from cassidy 16 knit clark 17 *kfb k6 kfb* twice <20 sts> materials= row 18 -28 -- knit  yarn for the body and legs of the 29 *ssk k6 k2tog* twice <16 sts> lizard 30 knit  embroidery thread for eyes 31 *ssk k4 k2tog* twice <12 sts>  tapestry needle  double point needles that at the end of row 31 stuff body with stuffing accommodate yarn for a tight gauge and continue working  polyfill stuffing 32 *k2tog k1*four times <8 sts> required skills- row 33 -44 --knit  kfb 45 k2tog k to end <7 sts>  k2tog 46 knit  ssk 47 knit  knitting in the round  i-cord optional repeat row 45-47 until 5 sts remain head body and tail 48 k1 k2tog k2tog <3 sts> 49 knit co 6 and distribute onto 3 dpns continue working in the round as follows- cut yarn and thread through remaining stitches pull tight then hide yarn end 1 kfb all sts <12 sts> somewhere in body 2 *k 5 kfb* twice <14 sts> legs make 4 repeat row 2 increasing the number in the parenthesis by one each time until you have co 6 and either distribute between 3 dpns 24 sts or work in i-cord work for 6 row cut yarn and pull through stitches hide yarn end 8 knit somewhere in body sew co edge to body 9 knit to finish lizard embroider eyes onto head 10 k until 2 from end k2tog <23 sts> where desired enjoy 11 ssk k8 k2tog ssk k9 <20 sts>
